name: 3 rd International Conference On Applied Sciences, Engineering, Technology and Management
content: The 3 rd International Conference On Applied Sciences, Engineering, Technology and Management (ICASETEM-2022), which is scheduled to be held on the 17th and 18th of March, 2022 is themed around the numerous outstanding results and new difficulties in the applied sciences, engineering, technology as well as management sectors. This event aims to draw together researchers, specialists, designers, and students in all fields of engineering, applied sciences, management, technology and provides a global panel for the dissemination of primary study conclusions, new approaches, and developmental practices that focus on both principles and application.
